mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.IDX DESC) RNUM, a.IDX, a.WRITER, a.SUBJECT, SUBSTR(TRIM(a.CONTENT), 1, 100) AS CONTENT, TO_CHAR(a.WRITEDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS WRITEDATE, NVL(a.TAG, '태그가 없습니다') AS TAG, a.FILENAME, b.MEMBER_IMG FROM COMM_TRAVELREVIEW a, MEMBER b WHERE a.DEL_FLAG = 'n' AND a.WRITER = b.NAME
mapper.insert:
SELECT COMM_TRAVELREVIEW_IDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO COMM_TRAVELREVIEW ( IDX, WRITER, SUBJECT, CONTENT, REGION, WRITEDATE, TAG ) VALUES ( #{IDX}, #{WRITER}, #{SUBJECT}, #{CONTENT}, #{REGION}, SYSDATE, #{TAG} )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMM_TRAVELREVIEW SET HITCOUNT = NVL(HITCOUNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, WRITER, SUBJECT, CONTENT, HITCOUNT, RECOMMENDCOUNT, REGION, WRITEDATE, FILENAME, TAG FROM COMM_TRAVELREVIEW WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMM_TRAVELREVIEW SET DEL_FLAG = 'y' WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.REF DESC, a.RE_STEP ASC) RNUM, a.IDX, a.WRITER, a.CONTENT, a.REF, a.RE_LEVEL, a.RE_STEP, TO_CHAR(a.WRITEDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH:mm:SS') AS WRITEDATE, b.MEMBER_IMG FROM COMM_TRAVELREVIEW_COMMENT a, MEMBER b WHERE ARTICLEID = #{ARTICLEID} AND a.WRITER = b.NAME
mapper.update: UPDATE COMM_TRAVELREVIEW_COMMENT SET RE_STEP = #{RE_STEP}+1 WHERE REF = #{REF} AND RE_STEP >= #{RE_STEP}
mapper.insert:
SELECT COMM_TRAVELREVIEW_C_IDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO COMM_TRAVELREVIEW_COMMENT ( IDX, ARTICLEID, WRITER, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, REF, RE_STEP, RE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( #{IDX}, #{ARTICLEID}, #{WRITER}, #{CONTENT}, SYSDATE, #{REF}, #{RE_STEP}, #{RE_LEVEL} )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMM_TRAVELREVIEW_COMMENT SET REF = ( SELECT MAX(IDX) FROM COMM_TRAVELREVIEW_COMMENT ) WHERE IDX = ( SELECT MAX(IDX) FROM COMM_TRAVELREVIEW_COMMENT )
